item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: Welcome to the first blog article! We are so excited to move the entirety of PPL level development documentation here. This platform allows us to make more interactive (via React components), good looking documentation and having powerful search powered by Algolia!
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the first blog article! We are so excited to move the entirety of PPL level development documentation here. This platform allows us to make more interactive (via React components), good looking documentation and having powerful search powered by Algolia!

I hope you'll like the new home for PewPew docs.

Enjoy!
